title: Curvature Watch Face
summary: Watch face for Android Wear (requires an Android Wear watch!)
description: Curvature Watch Face is a simple, modern watchface for Android Wear devices. It shows a zoomed-in view of a clock with minute represented as a colored part of the clock's edge.ATTENTION: Requires an Android Wear compatible device. This app doesn't appear on your phone, only on your watch. After you install the app, you will find it listed in the Android Wear app, or you can select it as your watch face directly by holding down your watch's screen and selecting Curvature.
descriptionHTML:
Curvature Watch Face is a simple, modern watchface for Android Wear devices. It shows a zoomed-in view of a clock with minute represented as a colored part of the clock's edge.

ATTENTION: Requires an Android Wear compatible device. This app doesn't appear on your phone, only on your watch. After you install the app, you will find it listed in the Android Wear app, or you can select it as your watch face directly by holding down your watch's screen and selecting Curvature.
comments: Simple, most elegant and distinguished look. Could improve further, without loosing its simple cocept (choice of color, blinking little point to inform of coming info on the watch etc.)
Nice looking watchface Can you add the option to I change font sizes?  Especially the date in the corner.  Will give 5 stars.
Looks great but doesn't fit the circular design of the Moto 360Sport. I can barely read the day and there is no date because of it. Otherwise it looks great.
Awesome love it please can we have an update to change the colour thanks
Beautiful watch face but needs a customization options.
